options.systemMessage: You summarize the meeting transcript to Markdown

json.output:
# Meeting Summary – Project Update & Next Steps | Item | Summary | |------|---------| | **Current Project Status** | • Project still on a February go‑live window as per PCG.
• Initial July target shifted; no firm date yet because milestones (build, test, data migration) are still being hit. | | **Build & Test** | • Compliance applications: ~100 total, 10 built, 45 priority.
• Remaining work focuses on building and testing these compliance apps. | | **Data Migration** | • Largest outstanding task – especially for transaction data.
• Concerns from CFO about complexity and length of migration.
• Need clarity on load‑file configuration; possible missing “second load folder.”
• Requests: early next week update on migration status, mapping of code values, and explanation of any load issues. | | **Configuration** | • Transaction config considered complete for months.
• Any changes during migration need to be locked in the config master; change‑freeze dates to be defined. | | **UAT Plan** | • UAT1: initial assessment (dates TBD).
• UAT2: pre‑final test.
• UAT3: full dress rehearsal of data migration and final testing.
• Exact schedule still being worked out; will align with key events. | | **Escalation & Support** | • Rohit, Kirsten, and the team are overwhelmed with questions; escalation to Tech One (direct contact) is recommended.
• Project leads should chase transaction‑related inquiries from their side. | | **Parallel Writes & Reconciliation** | • Business happy with parallel writes – reconciliation successful for first run.
• Second run also completed successfully. | | **Next Actions** | 1. **Send written update** on the new February schedule (by end of week).
2. **Provide migration status** and explain load‑file concerns early next week.
3. **Define change‑freeze dates** for data migration/configuration.
4. **Adjust variation to cover hyper‑care period** (PM time + cloud hosting) as needed.
5. **Escalate unresolved transaction questions** to Tech One or relevant experts. | | **Key Contacts** | • Kylie – escalations at the beginning of the week.
• Rahithra – frequent queries; needs support from tech leads.
• Kirsten – overloaded with questions; may need additional help. | --- ### Action Items (Assigned) | Owner | Task | Deadline | |-------|------|----------| | Project Lead | Draft and send written update on February schedule | End of week | | Data Migration Team | Early next‑week status report & load‑file explanation | Monday | | Configuration Manager | Set change‑freeze dates; confirm config lock | Tuesday | | Escalation Lead | Coordinate with Tech One for transaction queries | As needed | --- **Next Meeting:** Early next week (date to be confirmed via email). Please let me know if anything needs clarification or further detail.
